page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: A sample survey was conducted around Cowley to determine the recreational habits of the people living there. Older women tended to involve themselves in pastimes like knitting,gardening and cooking.Younger women enjoyed dancing,listening to or playing music,swimming and playing netball.Women of all ages enjoyed sewing,reading and watching T.V./Videos. Some older men found relaxation in gardening.Many men of all ages enjoyed reading,playing or watching snooker or golf,and like the ladies they also enjoyed watching T.V./Videos.Younger men seemed to enjoy computers,weight lifting,and fishing.Many enjoyed playing soccer and cricket. Few men or women went to the cinema or theatre in this the age of the video machine.
